character.statement: Very clever! You nearly had me. But no one outfoxes Myron Van Buren.
The thrill of the hunt, my dear! All for the thrill of the hunt.
Now... time for me to add another trophy to my collection.
No matter -- my aim's just as good from here!
Not if I can help it!
Have a taste of your own medicine!
You've made your last hunt, Van Buren.
